name: Musical Memory
description:
Musical Memory is a brilliant implementation of the classic family favourite, taking it to the next level with 6 different tones, not 4.

Now you can have fun whilst at the same time improving your memory through the power of music.

The computer generated sequence gets faster with each turn - it'll drive you crazy! What's the longest sequence you can hold in your head?

The faster you can correctly repeat the sequence, the more points you get.

Featuring beautiful Retina display compatible high resolution graphics.
